title: Did the Attorney General of Alabama Once Tell the Ku Klux Klan to ‘Kiss My Ass’?
subtitle: Bill Baxley wrote the famously succinct letter to a KKK Grand Dragon in 1976 in response to threats intended to intimidate him.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The former Alabama state Attorney general, Bill Baxley, once told a Ku Klux Klan Grand Dragon "kiss my ass" in response to threats.
